title: FUBAR Renamer 2014 v2.1
description:
FUBAR Renamer 2014 v2.1
-----------------------

Bug-fixes:
The stand-alone version did not work. Some extra files was required.
The coded needed has now been added to the application; and thus the extra files has also been removed from the installer, as they are no longer needed.

XP-support has been recoded. This version will now run on XP as well.

-----------




Another version of this very destructive tool!

As always, there is 2 warnings, when you run this application.

This application will rename all files and folders, on all harddisks and removable disks.
All items will be given a completely random new name.

Nothing will be deleted or destroyed. Only files and folders will be renamed.
Recovery is almost impossible!


This time, you get 2 editions:
- The normal one, which will do it's job when you run it.
- An installer, that will run next time any user logs into Windows.


This version will work on Windows XP!



Have fun, enjoy. And be careful!


/Ubehage
